page.title: 20LANDSCAPE
page.content: VELINDRE MEANS PLACE WITH A MILL, THERE WAS ONCE A MILL HERE. VELINDRE IS SMALL.IT IS NEXT TO A FOREST AND SURROUNDED BY FIELDS.IT HAS A BROOK RUNNING THROUGH IT.THERE ARE ABOUT 60 HOUSES ONE PUB,A CHAPEL WHICH IS NOW A DANCE STUDIO,ONE SCHOOL WITH 22 CHILDREN AND A VILLAGE HALL.THERE IS NO SHOP OR POSTOFFICE. THERE IS A WEEKLY BUS TO THE MARKET TOWN.THERE ARE TWO PLAYGROUNDS FOR THE CHILDREN. ONE HAS SWINGS,A SLIDE,A CLIMBING FRAME AND A ROUNDABOUT.THE OTHER HAS A CLIMBING APPARATUS AND A FOOTBALL PITCH.SOME OF THE BUILDINGS ARE OLD, AND SOME HAVE JUST BEEN BUILT. THE VILLAGE HALL IS USED EACH WEEK FOR YOUTH CLUB AND A MOTHER AND TODDLER GROUP.OTHER FUNCTIONS SUCH AS WHIST DRIVES AND PARTIES ARE HELD THERE.
